testcase.name: Increase dimensions
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Increase dimensions Given two matrix ... passed in 0.002s When they have the same dimensions ... passed in 0.001s Then join operation should return matrix with dimension + 1 ... passed in 0.004s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Different dimensions
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Different dimensions Given two matrix ... passed in 0.001s When they do not have the same dimensions ... passed in 0.000s Then join operation should return matrix with biggest matrix dimension + 1 ... passed in 0.016s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Values in the joined matrix
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Values in the joined matrix Given two matrix ... passed in 0.002s When they have the same dimensions ... passed in 0.001s Then each joined matrix value is the sum of the corresponding cells in the two source matrices ... passed in 0.004s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Null matrix
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Null matrix Given two matrix ... passed in 0.001s When one of them is Null ... passed in 0.001s Then join operation should return the other matrix (or return if both are Null) ... passed in 0.001s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
